segments.text: Are you looking for part time or full time employment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To start with I would like something part time with the hope that it can develop into something full time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you are interested in being with a company for the long term ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's right . I like this city very much and would like to make my home here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is an application . Please fill it out to the best of your ability . Did you bring a resume and references ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . I have them here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Keep them until you ready to give me the application and you can turn them all in at once .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . This should only take me a few minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
